name: MIDICIProfileState
desc: An object that provides the enabled and disabled profiles for a MIDI channel or port on a device.

items.name: init(channel: MIDIChannelNumber, enabledProfiles: [MIDICIProfile], disabledProfiles: [MIDICIProfile])
items.desc: Creates a new profile state object for the specified MIDI channel and profiles.

items.name: var midiChannel: MIDIChannelNumber
items.desc: The MIDI channel to which this state applies.
